channel.title: End of SBoT - Email from RichyT
channel.description:
So I thought it would be a great idea to post this old ass email from page 293 of my gmail inbox.
This is a mass email from RichyT, www.sbot198.com Hi It's been a strange... 12 months - nearly to the day. It all started back in the day of free-games forums. Where, among the mess, I stumbled upon a non-keylogged SCAR, and 'teamed up' with my first RS Cheating friend, Scythe. After discovering the magic of shemales, I decided to go on to better things. That's when we made rshacks forum... Infact, I remember see'ing one of the original moderators from back then. Then came richyt.com - which I believe Billy is still trying to do. Many many users, lots of experience gained in SCAR scripting - and the first time I tried my hand at AR (AsheyRune as it was back then) - that died in a day or so. This is also when I first met saevion, who is a great guy. Billy took over, never been the same since - and I started using rscheatnet.com for a while. During that time I started a bot called SuXABoT, some of you will have heard of it - it ran AR style scripts, and was around in the time before mass-bottage. We had a small community on nenolod - a small gaming network. Then eP gave it to Sean, Sean cracked the pathetic auth - and released it to the masses. Then, at some random point, I got a PM on RSCN IRC, saying to come to irc.autorune.org. AutoRune was finally back, and RaW gave me a free auth Smile. I stuck with AutoRune for a long time, and even into the days of SBoT. Then came sbot irc, new location, new power, new people - all good stuff... Today: I can't tell you exactly what happened, but I'll confirm it's nothing to do with the update, but what I did has given me no choice but to quit RS - it's the least I can do. Thankyou's in order of appearance: Scythe - met him on free-games forum some time last year, the only guy who wasn't out for a quick scam, made a nice little autominer once. Saevion - the second memory, for some reason he helped me - and started my adventures into java land. He let me in on some slightly deobbed code, and I found out that ixBot was real Wink After a while of helping me, I guess he just got bored - and passed me on to Sean. *RS2 release* Sean - A great influence, without him there would have never been any SBoT, and I would never have made any sort of bot in my life. He had no reason to help me, but he did. He gave me the code to a really nooby RS2 autofighter - and showed me how to make a bot by using IT as an example, also sent me SITE - IT2, but not quite as sexy. evilpat - Sean's evil partner in crime, always good for a laugh - part of the SAB community Smile PR4Y - The love of my life, there isn't a day goes by without thinking about him Sad - great guy. Mediator - steals your info, loses to me on CS Smile RaW - met him, he had a history of scamming, and wasn't going to give up easily. If you knock away the scamming and the bullshitting, he's not that bad - he never actually scammed me, so it didn't really bother me at all Smile waffendennis - great guy, without him SBoT would have died months ago, even though he is a jagex mod - he's one hell of a good guy, and hasn't done anything but good for us all. My 2nd cousin Lee - If I hadn't got suspended for doing 'nasty' things to him, I wouldnt have made SBoT. As some of you may remember, I made it in the 2 days I was suspended from school. Kaitnieks - Everyone knows Kaitnieks! Great guy, knows a lot of stuff about a lot of stuff, was willing to go out of his way to help me - without him there would be no SBoT. SaladFork - great guy, even though he hasn't been around lately he still owns ass. haxorjr - He left a long time ago, even though he was a bit of a noob as you would say, he's a great guy - havn't seen him in a while, good times though... good times. P_0_T - cool guy, share a server with him, kept me sane - the only guy who has my real phone number <3 RaiZeN - introduced me to the great world of CS, hope we stay in touch - even though you did(not?(not?(not?))) scam P_0_T, your still aight. GhOsT_ID - <3 Vegunks - Great moderator, keeps the peace well. Phate - Great guy, good luck with wastedbot. Tobbe - great guy, loves my cash as I love him. evo - havn't had much of a conversation with him, but we've had the odd PM session on TARC. Great guy, very intelligent and obviously very talented. Nicoleta - none of you have ever met her, and I doubt you ever will - nor will she ever read this, however - she is the coder of the OCR. She is a great person to talk to, always proffessional and obviously has a great future in coding. Those are the ones I can remember, I'm sure that there are many more I have missed out - but no <3 loss. Especially the forum moderators - you've done a great job. What now you ask? Well, I will leave this server running for as long as I can manage. Maybe, if Tobbe will pay $70 towards the fund (I'm sure you will find a way to gather that much a month) then this server will stay for another month. I'm not sure about the IRC server though, I have only paid 1 installment, and it's been a good 3 months Wink FOCR is on this server, so for as long as sleeping is as it is, that will stay. I will go through a mass-ban of my own, and remove a lot of people from my MSN list that I don't talk to on a regular basis - nothing personal, it's just getting very crowded in there. I'll hang around IRC for a while, just to keep the peace. But no more FOCR auths will be sold, and I wont be helping people with SBoT problems... No - SBoT source code won't be released. I have been contemplating leaving for a while, as some of you may know I started thinking about leaving back when everything died on me, and my money got lost. For something I have done now, I have no choice but to leave - I can't stay with knowning what I have done. I do hope you all enjoyed SBoT, and what it has brought you. I also hope that you will think as me as a positive in the world of RS cheating. Well, I think that's it. 36 hours, 3 hours sleep - it's been a bad day or 2 for me, hope it wasn't so bad for the rest of you. It's been fun Smile Richard Taylor.
Dated as 10/28/04. I smiled a bit when I read the part about waffendennis.

item.title: End of SBoT - Email from RichyT
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“David, post:9, topic:301183”]Heh, I remember SBot and RichyT. He was a really cool guy, and I can’t remember if 04 (such a long time ago!) was around the time of Aryan, but I remember using SBot2 during that time, just before the update that killed everything.

Considering I’ve pretty much left rscheating, it’s great to look back and read about all the stuff that happened back then. It all seemed so much ‘tighter’. I also can’t believe it was ~6-7 years ago.[/quote]Wow you sir are way off

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Kmb, post:15, topic:301183”][quote author=jme link=topic=397479.msg2952121#msg2952121 date=1252595254]

RichyT came back for SBoT2 around aryan times, i used to speak to him on msn at that time, i used to crack SBoT3 when it was released and he always tried to find out how i did it
change a ICONST to 1 instead of 0 (was always in class b).

He also popped in once in a while before sbot2
[/quote]
Is Pwnd still around? I remember using his SBoT2/3 auth way before Aryan was released. Man that bot sucked.[/quote]

He’s banned here, but he is on IRC a lot

Read full topic

item.title: End of SBoT - Email from RichyT
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

So I thought it would be a great idea to post this old ass email from page 293 of my gmail inbox.

This is a mass email from RichyT, www.sbot198.com

Hi

It’s been a strange… 12 months - nearly to the day. It all started back in the day of free-games forums. Where, among the mess, I stumbled upon a non-keylogged SCAR, and ‘teamed up’ with my first RS Cheating friend, Scythe. After discovering the magic of shemales, I decided to go on to better things. That’s when we made rshacks forum… Infact, I remember see’ing one of the original moderators from back then.

Then came richyt.com - which I believe Billy is still trying to do. Many many users, lots of experience gained in SCAR scripting - and the first time I tried my hand at AR (AsheyRune as it was back then) - that died in a day or so. This is also when I first met saevion, who is a great guy.

Billy took over, never been the same since - and I started using rscheatnet.com for a while. During that time I started a bot called SuXABoT, some of you will have heard of it - it ran AR style scripts, and was around in the time before mass-bottage. We had a small community on nenolod - a small gaming network. Then eP gave it to Sean, Sean cracked the pathetic auth - and released it to the masses.

Then, at some random point, I got a PM on RSCN IRC, saying to come to irc.autorune.org. AutoRune was finally back, and RaW gave me a free auth Smile. I stuck with AutoRune for a long time, and even into the days of SBoT.

Then came sbot irc, new location, new power, new people - all good stuff…

Today: I can’t tell you exactly what happened, but I’ll confirm it’s nothing to do with the update, but what I did has given me no choice but to quit RS - it’s the least I can do.

Thankyou’s in order of appearance:
Scythe - met him on free-games forum some time last year, the only guy who wasn’t out for a quick scam, made a nice little autominer once.

Saevion - the second memory, for some reason he helped me - and started my adventures into java land. He let me in on some slightly deobbed code, and I found out that ixBot was real Wink After a while of helping me, I guess he just got bored - and passed me on to Sean.

RS2 release

Sean - A great influence, without him there would have never been any SBoT, and I would never have made any sort of bot in my life. He had no reason to help me, but he did. He gave me the code to a really nooby RS2 autofighter - and showed me how to make a bot by using IT as an example, also sent me SITE - IT2, but not quite as sexy.

evilpat - Sean’s evil partner in crime, always good for a laugh - part of the SAB community Smile

PR4Y - The love of my life, there isn’t a day goes by without thinking about him Sad - great guy.

Mediator - steals your info, loses to me on CS Smile

RaW - met him, he had a history of scamming, and wasn’t going to give up easily. If you knock away the scamming and the bullshitting, he’s not that bad - he never actually scammed me, so it didn’t really bother me at all Smile

waffendennis - great guy, without him SBoT would have died months ago, even though he is a jagex mod - he’s one hell of a good guy, and hasn’t done anything but good for us all.

My 2nd cousin Lee - If I hadn’t got suspended for doing ‘nasty’ things to him, I wouldnt have made SBoT. As some of you may remember, I made it in the 2 days I was suspended from school.

Kaitnieks - Everyone knows Kaitnieks! Great guy, knows a lot of stuff about a lot of stuff, was willing to go out of his way to help me - without him there would be no SBoT.

SaladFork - great guy, even though he hasn’t been around lately he still owns ass.

haxorjr - He left a long time ago, even though he was a bit of a noob as you would say, he’s a great guy - havn’t seen him in a while, good times though… good times.

P_0_T - cool guy, share a server with him, kept me sane - the only guy who has my real phone number <3

RaiZeN - introduced me to the great world of CS, hope we stay in touch - even though you did(not?(not?(not?))) scam P_0_T, your still aight.

GhOsT_ID - <3

Vegunks - Great moderator, keeps the peace well.

Phate - Great guy, good luck with wastedbot.

Tobbe - great guy, loves my cash as I love him.

evo - havn’t had much of a conversation with him, but we’ve had the odd PM session on TARC. Great guy, very intelligent and obviously very talented.

Nicoleta - none of you have ever met her, and I doubt you ever will - nor will she ever read this, however - she is the coder of the OCR. She is a great person to talk to, always proffessional and obviously has a great future in coding.

Those are the ones I can remember, I’m sure that there are many more I have missed out - but no <3 loss. Especially the forum moderators - you’ve done a great job.

What now you ask?
Well, I will leave this server running for as long as I can manage. Maybe, if Tobbe will pay $70 towards the fund (I’m sure you will find a way to gather that much a month) then this server will stay for another month. I’m not sure about the IRC server though, I have only paid 1 installment, and it’s been a good 3 months Wink FOCR is on this server, so for as long as sleeping is as it is, that will stay. I will go through a mass-ban of my own, and remove a lot of people from my MSN list that I don’t talk to on a regular basis - nothing personal, it’s just getting very crowded in there. I’ll hang around IRC for a while, just to keep the peace. But no more FOCR auths will be sold, and I wont be helping people with SBoT problems… No - SBoT source code won’t be released.

I have been contemplating leaving for a while, as some of you may know I started thinking about leaving back when everything died on me, and my money got lost. For something I have done now, I have no choice but to leave - I can’t stay with knowning what I have done.

I do hope you all enjoyed SBoT, and what it has brought you. I also hope that you will think as me as a positive in the world of RS cheating.

Well, I think that’s it.
36 hours, 3 hours sleep - it’s been a bad day or 2 for me, hope it wasn’t so bad for the rest of you.

It’s been fun Smile
Richard Taylor.

Dated as 10/28/04.

I smiled a bit when I read the part about waffendennis.

Read full topic
item.source: End of SBoT - Email from RichyT
